channel.title: Repeatedly adding items

item.title: Repeatedly adding items
item.dc:creator: @p0sesed_s0ul p0sesed s0ul
item.description:
@p0sesed_s0ul wrote:

case 2102: if (actionTimer == 0) { pEmote = 625; resetanim = 999; actionTimer = 5 if (misc.random(2) == 1) { addItem(995, 200); addSkillXP(1000, 10); sendMessage("You swing your pickaxe at the rock and receive coins!"); } else { if (actionTimer == 0 && misc.random(2) == 2) { sendMessage("You fail to receive coins!"); actionTimer = 5 } } break;
and if you get hundred errors try adding another } at the end
if you get 2 errors they could be that on the actiontimer resets you need ;?
you can figure out what i did and why i did it right?

Read full topic

item.title: Repeatedly adding items
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

case 2102: if (actionTimer == 0) { pEmote = 625; resetanim = 999; actionTimer = 5 if (misc.random(2) == 1) { addItem(995, 200); addSkillXP(1000, 10); sendMessage("You swing your pickaxe at the rock and receive coins!"); } else { sendMessage("You fail you receive coins!"); }

Could anyone point me in the general direction of where to go from there? Right now you just click and click a lot and you fail and receive items. I need it to continually add items.

Read full topic
